dict.string:
import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') cmd = os.getenv('mod')
shell_cmd= '{0} -s {1} reboot {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, cmd) sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) print("Reboot device succeed") except: print("Reboot device failed")

import subprocess import os import sys import re
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell getprop debug.layout'.format(adb_path, serial)
try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True).strip() isOn = 'off' if result.lower() != 'on': isOn = 'on' shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell setprop debug.layout {2} && {0} -s {1} shell service call activity 1599295570'.format(adb_path, serial, isOn) result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True).strip() sys.stderr.write(result) print("Debug layout is " + isOn) except: print("Failed to toggle debug layout")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package') adb_s = "{query}" datetime = os.getenv('time') mod = os.getenv('mod') remote_path = "sdcard/screenshot_{0}.png".format(datetime) shell_cmd_1 = '{0} shell screencap -p {1}'.format(adb_s, remote_path) shell_cmd_2 = "{0} pull {1} {2}".format(adb_s, remote_path, ("/tmp/", "~/Desktop/")[mod == "cmd"]) shell_cmd_3 = "{0} shell rm {1}".format(adb_s, remote_path) sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd_1 + "\n") sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd_2 + "\n") sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd_3 + "\n") try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd_1, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result) result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd_2, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result) result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd_3, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result) local_path = "" if mod and mod == "cmd": local_path = "~/Desktop/screenshot_{0}.png".format(datetime) else: local_path = "/tmp/screenshot_{0}.png".format(datetime)
if not mod == "cmd": shell_cmd_4 = "osascript -e 'on run args' -e 'set thisFile to item 1 of args' -e 'set the clipboard to (read thisFile as «class PNGf»)' -e return -e end {0}".format(local_path) if subprocess.call(['which', 'osascript']) == 0: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd_4, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result) elif subprocess.call(['which', 'xclip']) == 0: result = subprocess.check_output("xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png -i {0}".format(local_path), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result)
result = subprocess.check_output("rm {0}".format(local_path), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result) print("Screenshot captured to clipboard") else: print("Screenshot captured to desktop") except: print("Failed to capture screenshot")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path')
response = subprocess.check_output( '{0} kill-server && {1} start-server'.format(adb_path, adb_path), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
if 'daemon started successfully' in response: print('adb successfully restarted') else: print('Failed to restart adb')

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package')
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell am start -a android.settings.APPLICATION_DETAILS_SETTINGS -d package:{2}'.format(adb_path, serial, package) # sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
print("App info of " + package + " shown") except: print("Failed to show app info of " + package)

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package')
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell am force-stop {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, package) # sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
print("Force stop " + package + " succeed") except: print("Force stop " + package + " failed")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package') mod = os.getenv('mod') adb_s = "{0} -s {1}".format(adb_path, serial)
shell_cmd_1 = '{0} shell settings get global sysui_demo_allowed'.format(adb_s) sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd_1 + "\n") try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd_1, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
if result and int(result) != 0: sys.stderr.write("Turn demo mode off") result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command exit".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result) result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell settings put global sysui_demo_allowed 0".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
else:
sys.stderr.write("Turn demo mode on") result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell settings put global sysui_demo_allowed 1".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command enter".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command clock -e hhmm 1200".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command battery -e plugged false -e level 100".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result) shell_cmd = "{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command network -e mobile show -e level 4 -e datatype false".format(adb_s) sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command network -e wifi show -e level 4 -e fully true".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
result = subprocess.check_output("{0} shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e notifications -e visible false".format(adb_s), stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
sys.stderr.write(result)
except: print("Failed to capture screenshot")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') ip = os.getenv('ip') shell_cmd = '{0} connect {1}'.format(adb_path, ip) sys.stderr.write("Execute:\n{0}\n".format(shell_cmd)) try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result) print("Executed: adb connect " + ip) except: print("Failed to execute: adb connect " + ip)

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package')
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell monkey -p {2} -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER 1'.format(adb_path, serial, package) # sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
print("Launch app " + package + " succeed") except: print("Launch app " + package + " failed")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package')
param = "" if os.getenv('mod') == "keep_data": param = "-k"
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell pm clear {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, package) # sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
print("Data clear " + package + " succeed") except: print("Data clear " + package + " failed")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') ip = os.getenv('ip') shell_cmd = '{0} disconnect {1}'.format(adb_path, ip) sys.stderr.write("Execute:\n{0}\n".format(shell_cmd)) try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result) print("Executed: adb disconnect " + ip) except: print("Failed to execute: adb disconnect " + ip)

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package')
param = "" if os.getenv('mod') == "keep_data": param = "-k"
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell pm uninstall {2} {3}'.format(adb_path, serial, param, package) # sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
print("Uninstall app " + package + " succeed") except: print("Uninstall app " + package + " failed")

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') cmd = os.getenv('function')[5:] shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, cmd) sys.stderr.write("Execute:\n{0}\n".format(shell_cmd)) try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result) print("Executed: " + cmd) except: print("Failed to execute: adb "+cmd)

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') package = os.getenv('package') prettyVersion = os.getenv('pretty_version')
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell pm path {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, package) # sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) if result and result.startswith("package:"): path = result[8:].strip() shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} pull {2} ~/Desktop/{3}-{4}.apk'.format(adb_path, serial, path, package, prettyVersion) sys.stderr.write(shell_cmd) subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) print("Apk extracted to desktop") else: print("Failed to extract apk") except: print("Failed to extract apk")
Input the file name of APK

import subprocess import os import sys
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') cmd = os.getenv('function')[5:]
print('{0} -s {1} {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, cmd))

import subprocess import os import sys import pipes
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') emulator_path = os.getenv('emulator_path')
shell_cmd = "" status_cmd = "{0} -avd {query}".format(emulator_path)
result = subprocess.check_output(status_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True)
or folder name for batch installation
Input the file name of APK

import subprocess import os import sys import pipes
adb_path = os.getenv('adb_path') serial = os.getenv('serial') cmd = os.getenv('function') text = os.getenv('key') mod = os.getenv('mod')
if cmd=="text": text = pipes.quote(text.replace(" ", "%s"))
shell_cmd = "" status_cmd = "{0} -s {1} shell dumpsys window | grep mCurrentFocus".format(adb_path, serial) if cmd == "STATUS_BAR":
result = subprocess.check_output(status_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) expanded = "StatusBar" in result
shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell service call statusbar {2}'.format(adb_path, serial, ("1", "2")[expanded]) elif cmd == "KEYBOARD": shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell input {2} {3} {4}'.format(adb_path, serial, cmd, mod, text) else: shell_cmd = '{0} -s {1} shell input {2} {3} {4}'.format(adb_path, serial, cmd, ("", "--longpress")[mod=="cmd"], text)
sys.stderr.write("Execute:\n{0}\n".format(shell_cmd)) try: result = subprocess.check_output(shell_cmd, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, shell=True) sys.stderr.write(result) print("Executed: " + cmd) except: print("Failed to execute: adb "+cmd)

# Workflow Configuration
- adb_path, e.g. "~/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools/adb" - aapt_path, e.g. "~/Library/Android/sdk/build-tools/28.0.3/aapt" - emulator_path, e.g. "~/Library/Android/sdk/tools/emulator"
# Usage
Use keyword "adb" to get quick access to:
- restart adb - connect/disconnect devices over WiFi - check connected devices - run any shell command to target device - check installed application to force stop, clear data, uninstall - install new APK or APKs with various options - take screenshot and/or copy to clipboard - open settings, dev tool, WiFi, applications, accessibility page - toggle debug layout and demo mode - advanced reboot - input key or text on device
Use keyword "apk" to check the infomation of apk file and execute installation
Use keyword "avd" to list and start emulator
